text:
Place is clean and has the right set up for a cozy movie experience with all the thoughtful little touches in the room.
However, we didn't get to enjoy our 2 hours as most channels had to be subscribed. Staff didnt give friendly reminder when we arrived, that he can sign in for us to watch. Only knew this 15 min before time was up because we went to the WC and informed him we could only watched limited chinese drama, variety etc.

Our impression was that movie channels and netflix should have been automatically signed in before guests arrive. Otherwise why would people pay to watch if we already have access.

It was the perfect setting for a special occasion or even just a day/night out with friends or family, allowing for a more relaxed and personal experience. The privacy aspect was also a big bonus. No distractions, no noise, and no interruptionsâ€”just us and the movie! Recommended!!
A great hangout place , totally recommended. The staff are nice and welcoming. The rooms are superb, really cozy and great for hangouts! Can bring outside food and drinks, totally worth to visit!
Been here a few times to binge watch movies/ dramas.. room is spacious with comfortable sofa and i can bring my own snacks too. great place to chill without any disturbance

The best to watch films together and to feel as home too. The place was super cool and clean and more over allowing outside foods while watching movies was the best thing ever. Pinned as one of my favorite place.
